subject: Coaches and Managers
College Athletics
Football (College)
Bonuses
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: A review of the contracts for more than 40 major college football coaches reveals a wide variety of salary increases, lucrative bonuses and desirable perks.
snippet: A review of the contracts for more than 40 major college football coaches reveals a wide variety of salary increases, lucrative bonuses and desirable perks.
